Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-31852 affecting package clang16 for versions less than 16.0.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-31852 affecting package clang16 for versions less than 16.0.0-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package clang16 is earlier than 16.0.0-1, affected by CVE-2024-31852
